template <typename T, typename RequiredLP, typename ActualLP>
struct vsip::impl::Is_layout_compatible
File: ../../../vsip/core/adjust_layout.hpp

Determine if an given layout policy is compatible with a required layout policy.

The value_type 'T' is used to determine when differences between complex_type matter.
